alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Botetourt (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alleghany and northwestern Botetourt Counties in west central Virginia and the City of Covington through 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Covington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington... Clifton Forge... Iron Gate... Low Moor... Glen Wilton... Longdale Furnace... and Gala. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
